title: geoPoint
description: General Geo Point model. Geo point refers to ground location

lon.description:
Longitude in Ds egrees and decimal point at best accuracy
E.G - 32.45454

lat.description:
Latitude in Ds egrees and decimal point at best accuracy
E.G - 35.23456

alt.description:
Geo point ground altitude ASL
If not sent - will considered as 0 in the UTM
